course_title: Approaches to Enquiry in Population and Public Health

sections.comments: Course is delivered entirely online via UBC Canvas.  To access the course module, go to www.canvas.ubc.caPlease note the actual scheduled time for this course is 1.30 to 4.30 however extra time has been allowed at the beginning and end of the class.

description: Research approaches in the area of population and public health; focus on developing research questions and the centrality of research questions in conducting research.
